::Lavacons::

        Astral was hit by DevilDuer's shots, then suddenlt hit in the back
by plasma bolts.

        Astral went flying.

     "AHH!!!!  More Alliance members!!!!  Fools!!!!!  Surrender!!!!  Or
prepare to be obliterated!!" Astral said.

     Astral did a backwards roll, and landed in a kneeling position.

     Astral grabbed his deadly rocket launcher, which he always kept for
tight situations.

     He holsted the rocket launcher on his shoulder, and then fired one shot
at DevilDuer, and one shot at Nemesis Enforcer.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Fenox was hit by most of Scattershot's shots, and went flying back,
and went flying back faster and farther as he was hit by more shots, and hit
a tree.

       He talked in his com to all Lavacons, "All Lavacons, this is Vice
Admiral Fenox, I'm being double teamed on, despite Recklessa's help."

        Astral replied just after firing at DD and NE, "Hang in there Fenox,
I'm facing two of these Alliance goons too.  Okay everyone, time to face
these guys together!!!  Everyone, group up, so we can fire together!!!!!" He
ordered.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Everyone ran in the center of the battlefield, and started firing
all around, Astral at DevilDuer, Fenox at Hiss, Recklessa at Scavanger,
Starlight at Breakdown, and, Griplash at Pyro.

      "Looks like our sword fight's cancelled!!" Griplash said at Pyro,
firing his shoulder flame launchers.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Sickle::

         Sickle wondered.......Could he fight??

     "Fight???  I don't think I can do that, I've never done it before.  How
do I fight??"

Subject: Re: Reinforcements

>

his

>
